exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
ff: falsity_flag
R: BSRS
rho: env (string bool)
t2: term
t1: term

Goal:
rho ⊨ atom sPr (Vector.cons term t1 1 (Vector.cons term t2 0 (Vector.nil term))) <-> derivable R (eval rho t1) (eval rho t2)

Premises:
Inductive term (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) : Type := var : nat -> term | func : forall f : Σ_funcs, Vector.t term (ar_syms f) -> term Arguments term {Σ_funcs}, _ Arguments var {Σ_funcs} _%nat_scope, _ _ Arguments func {Σ_funcs}, _ _ _
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive falsity_flag : Set := falsity_off : falsity_flag | falsity_on : falsity_flag
eval : forall domain : Type, interp domain -> env domain -> term -> domain
string = fun X : Type => list X : Type -> Type Arguments string _%type_scope
BSRS = list (card bool) : Type
Inductive syms_pred : Set := sPr : syms_pred | sQ : syms_pred
Inductive derivable (X : Type) (P : stack X) : string X -> string X -> Prop := der_sing : forall x y : list X, In (x / y) P -> derivable P x y | der_cons : forall (x y : list X) (u v : string X), In (x / y) P -> derivable P u v -> derivable P (x ++ u) (y ++ v) Arguments derivable {X}%type_scope Arguments der_sing {X}%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments der_cons {X}%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
env = fun domain : Type => nat -> domain : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
atom : forall P : sig_pred, Vector.t term (ar_preds P) -> form
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Init.pr2 : forall s : Init.sigma ?B, ?B (Init.pr1 s) where ?A : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type] ?B : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- ?A -> Type]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n where ?A : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type] ?B : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
DepElim.eq_simplification_sigma1_dep : forall (p q : ?A) (x : ?P p) (y : ?P q), (forall e : p = q, eq_rect p ?P x q e = y -> ?B) -> Init.sigmaI ?P p x = Init.sigmaI ?P q y -> ?B where ?A : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type] ?P : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- ?A -> Type] ?B : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
DepElim.solution_left : forall t : ?A, ?B t -> forall x : ?A, x = t -> ?B x where ?A : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type] ?B : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- ?A -> Type]
enumerator__T_prod : forall (f1 : nat -> option ?X) (f2 : nat -> option ?Y), enumerator__T f1 ?X -> enumerator__T f2 ?Y -> enumerator__T (prod_enum f1 f2) (?X * ?Y) where ?X : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type] ?Y : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
der_sing : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X), In (x / y) P -> derivable P x y where ?X : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
der_cons : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X) (u v : string ?X), In (x / y) P -> derivable P u v -> derivable P (x ++ u) (y ++ v) where ?X : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
Init.sigmaI : forall (B : ?A -> Type) (pr1 : ?A), B pr1 -> Init.sigma B where ?A : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
ListEnumerabilityFacts.enumerator__T_list : forall L : nat -> list ?X, ListEnumerabilityFacts.list_enumerator__T' ?X L -> ListEnumerabilityFacts.list_enumerator__T' (list ?X) (ListEnumerabilityFacts.L_list L) where ?X : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
AllE : forall (A : list form) (t : term) (phi : form), A ⊢ (∀ phi) -> A ⊢ phi[t..] where ?p : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- peirce]
sat_single : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (rho : nat -> D) (Phi : form) (t : term), (eval rho t .: rho) ⊨ Phi < -> rho ⊨ Phi[t..]
DepElim.solution_right_dep : forall (t : ?A) (B : forall x : ?A, t = x -> Type), B t eq_refl -> forall (x : ?A) (Heq : t = x), B x Heq where ?A : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (S n) v)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v where ?A : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
size_ind : forall (f : ?X -> nat) (P : ?X -> Prop), (forall x : ?X, (forall y : ?X, f y < f x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : ?X, P x where ?X : [ff : falsity_flag R : BSRS rho : env (string bool) t1 : term t2 : term |- Type]
iprep_eval : forall (domain : Type) (I : interp domain) (rho : env domain) (x : string bool) (s : term), eval rho (prep x s) = iprep x (eval rho s)
sat_subst : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (rho : env D) (sigma : nat -> term) (phi : form), (forall x : nat, eval rho (sigma x) = rho x) -> rho ⊨ phi < -> rho ⊨ phi[sigma]
Kripke.kripke_tarski : forall (domain : Type) (I : interp domain) (rho : env domain) (phi : form), rho ⊨ phi < -> Kripke.ksat tt rho phi
impl_sat : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (A : list form) (rho : env D) (phi : form), rho ⊨ (A ==> phi) < -> (rho ⊫ A -> rho ⊨ phi)
ByteVector.to_Bvector = fix to_Bvector (n : nat) (v : ByteVector.ByteVector n) {struct v} : Bvector.Bvector (n * 8) := match v in (Vector.t _ n0) return (Bvector.Bvector (n0 * 8)) with | Vector.nil _ => Vector.nil bool | Vector.cons _ (Ascii.Ascii b0 b1 b2 b3 b4 b5 b6 b7) n0 v' => Vector.cons bool b0 (S (S (S (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8)))))))) (Vector.cons bool b1 (S (S (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8))))))) (Vector.cons bool b2 (S (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8)))))) (Vector.cons bool b3 (S (S (S (S (n0 * 8))))) (Vector.cons bool b4 (S (S (S (n0 * 8)))) (Vector.cons bool b5 (S (S (n0 *...
sat = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (domain : Type) (I : interp domain) => fix sat (ff : falsity_flag) (rho : env domain) (phi : form) {struct phi} : Prop := match phi with | falsity => False | atom P v => i_atom (Vector.map (eval rho) v) | bin _ _ _ b Impl phi0 psi => sat b rho phi0 -> sat b rho psi | quant _ _ _ b All phi0 => forall d : domain, sat b (d .: rho) phi0 end : forall (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (domain : Type), interp domain -> forall ff : falsity_flag, env domain -> form -> Prop Arguments sat {Σ_funcs Σ_preds} {domain}%type_scope {I ff}, {Σ_funcs} {Σ_preds} {domain} _ {ff} _ _
sat_comp : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (rho : env D) (xi : nat -> term) (phi : form), rho ⊨ phi[xi] < -> (xi >> eval rho) ⊨ phi
impl_sat' : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (A : list form) (rho : env D) (phi : form), rho ⊨ (A ==> phi) -> rho ⊫ A -> rho ⊨ phi
sat_ext : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (rho xi : nat -> D) (phi : form), (forall x : nat, rho x = xi x) -> rho ⊨ phi < -> xi ⊨ phi
ZifyClasses.mkrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : S -> T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (I n) (I m)) -> forall (s1 : S) (t1 : T), I s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S) (t2 : T), I s2 = t2 -> R s1 s2 < -> TR t1 t2
IB_enc : forall (rho : env (string bool)) (s : string bool), eval rho (enc s) = s
Kripke.ksat = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (domain : Type) (M : Kripke.kmodel domain) => fix ksat (ff : falsity_flag) (u : Kripke.nodes (domain:=domain)) (rho : nat -> domain) (phi : form) {struct phi} : Prop := match phi with | falsity => False | atom P v => Kripke.k_P u (Vector.map (eval rho) v) | bin _ _ _ b Impl phi0 psi => forall v : Kripke.nodes (domain:=domain), Kripke.reachable u v -> ksat b v rho phi0 ->...-> Prop Arguments Kripke.ksat {Σ_funcs Σ_preds} {domain}%type_scope {M ff} _ _%function_scope, {Σ_funcs} {Σ_preds} {domain} _ {ff} _ _ _
IB = B_I (fun f : sig_func => match f as s return (Vector.t (string bool) (ar_syms s) -> string bool) with | s_f b => fun v : Vector.t (string bool) (ar_syms (s_f b)) => b :: Vector.hd v | s_e => fun _ : Vector.t (string bool) (ar_syms s_e) => [] end) (fun P : sig_pred => match P as s return (Vector.t (string bool) (ar_preds s) -> Prop) with | sPr => fun v : Vector.t (string bool) (ar_preds sPr) => derivable R (Vector.hd v) (Vector.hd (Vector.tl v)) | sQ => fun _ : Vector.t (string bool) (ar_preds sQ) => dPCPb R end) : interp (string bool)
sat_ext' : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (ff : falsity_flag) (rho xi : nat -> D) (phi : form), (forall x : nat, rho x = xi x) -> rho ⊨ phi -> xi ⊨ phi
valid_ctx = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag) (A : list form) (phi : form) => forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho : env D), rho ⊫ A -> rho ⊨ phi : forall (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag), list form -> form -> Prop Arguments valid_ctx {Σ_funcs Σ_preds ff} _%list_scope
TM_sat : forall (rho : nat -> unit) (phi : form), rho ⊨ phi
satis = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag) (phi : form) => exists (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho : env D), rho ⊨ phi : forall (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag), form -> Prop Arguments satis {Σ_funcs Σ_preds ff}
valid = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag) (phi : form) => forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho : env D), rho ⊨ phi : forall (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag), form -> Prop Arguments valid {Σ_funcs Σ_preds ff}
IB_prep : forall (rho : env (list bool)) (s : string bool) (t : term), eval rho (prep s t) = s ++ eval rho t
Kripke.ksat_ext : forall (D : Type) (M : Kripke.kmodel D) (ff : falsity_flag) (u : Kripke.nodes (domain:=D)) (rho xi : nat -> D) (phi : form), (forall x : nat, rho x = xi x) -> Kripke.ksat u rho phi < -> Kripke.ksat u xi phi
eval_comp : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho : env D) (xi : nat -> term) (t : term), eval rho t`[xi] = eval (xi >> eval rho) t
Kripke.ksat_comp : forall (D : Type) (M : Kripke.kmodel D) (ff : falsity_flag) (u : Kripke.nodes (domain:=D)) (rho : nat -> D) (xi : nat -> term) (phi : form), Kripke.ksat u rho phi[xi] < -> Kripke.ksat u (xi >> eval rho) phi
enumerator__T_bool = fun x : bool => if x as b return (exists n : nat, bool_enum n = Some b) then ex_intro (fun n : nat => Some match n with | 0 => true | S _ => false end = Some true) 0 eq_refl else ex_intro (fun n : nat => bool_enum n = Some false) 1 eq_refl : enumerator__T bool_enum bool
eval_ext : forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho xi : nat -> D) (t : term), (forall x : nat, rho x = xi x) -> eval rho t = eval xi t
valid_L = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag) (A : list form) => forall (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho : env D), rho ⊫ A : forall (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag), list form -> Prop Arguments valid_L {Σ_funcs Σ_preds ff} _%list_scope
fullsatis = fun (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag) (A : list form) => exists (D : Type) (I : interp D) (rho : env D), rho ⊫ A : forall (Σ_funcs : funcs_signature) (Σ_preds : preds_signature) (ff : falsity_flag), list form -> Prop Arguments fullsatis {Σ_funcs Σ_preds ff} _%list_scope
